name: Police Fight Crime Escape
description:
Police Fight Crime Escape is an stimulating arcade fighting action game,action paked games,kung fu master games Fight when Prisoner enter your area and you fight like a karate master intense battle.Upgrade your Army power, energy, and accuracy with new kick and fighting styles earn points for each winning match.Fight against powerful border army fighters rivals, win over them and get points to unlock new army fighter of your evolution. Use your fighting skills to make your way out easy and simple.
Features
- Thrilling fighting and jumping animations
- Realistic climate and real gangster combat
- Select and modify your ownstyles
- Kung Fu Border fight tournaments with big rewards.
- A game of nonstop amusement.
